snippet: A large blast was felt throughout central Kabul in the middle of the morning rush hour Tuesday when a bomb was set off in front of the gates of an American military base.
abstract: Bomb is set off in front of gates of American military base in Kabul, Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: A large blast was felt throughout central Kabul in the middle of the morning rush hour Tuesday when a bomb was set off in front of the gates of an American military base.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Bomb Explodes in Kabul Outside Gates of U.S. Military Base
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Bomb Explodes in Kabul Outside Gates of U.S. Military Base
